cast.overview: Welcome to Sin City. This town beckons to the tough, the corrupt, the brokenhearted. Some call it dark… Hard-boiled. Then there are those who call it home — Crooked cops, sexy dames, desperate vigilantes. Some are seeking revenge, others lust after redemption, and then there are those hoping for a little of both. A universe of unlikely and reluctant heroes still trying to do the right thing in a city that refuses to care.
cast.title: Sin City

details.biography: Musician, songwriter and actor based in Los Angeles, California since 2010, where he is part of Americana band Ikes Creek, formed in 2017.  Simeone was born in Elk Butte, Idaho. He moved to Austin, Texas in 1997. While in Austin, he toured as a member of The Asylum Street Spankers and Austin Lounge Lizards
details.name: Korey Simeone
